Jakob Poeltl banked in a layup, followed by Davion Mitchell hounding Marcus Sasser into a turnover that led to a breakaway layup
RJ Barrett blocked Tobias Harris as the shot clock expired, and then drew a shooting foul and calmly nailed two free throws
